themes: concerns about material durability in public art
critique of superficiality in art presentations
key_phrases: what we really need is an education of public art
what it takes, materials, best materials for longevity
I see waay too many public art that has no clue what is actually long lived
they sure had a fancy presentation
barriers_identified: lack of knowledge about durable materials in public art
solutions_proposed: offer education on public art materials and longevity
